objectDesc.p: Palm-leaf manuscript. 89 leaves in Kuṭilā script. Apparently written in 1152 A.C.

history.p: In June 1934, Sāṅkṛtyāyana found this manuscript in the monastery of Kun-de-ling (Lhasa).

div.head:
mudrākara:–
śrī madanamohana dāsa
mukura pres
kaṭaka-2

{@sūcīpatra
śānti paboṅg@}
biṣaẏa pr̥ṣṭhāṅka
1| pāṇḍabaṅkara bhīṣmaṅka nikaṭaku gamana o
nītibākya śrabaṇa ... 1

lg.l:
4| durbāsā ruṣi kr̥ṣṇaṅka māẏā darśana kari
brahmāṅku jaṇāibā o koṇārka tīrtha
māhātmya barṇṇana ... 23
lg.head:
{@sāraḷā mahābhārata
śāntiparba
pāṇḍabaṅkara bhīṣmaṅka nikaṭaku gamana
o
nītibākya śrabaṇa@}

lg.l: bho muni agasti tumbhe aṭa brahmabettā
taba mukhuṁ śuṇi muhiṁ hoibi mukuti | 3 |
bhīṣmaṁku kahile se rājya kari pāri | 6 |
tahuṁ yujheṣṭhi bhīṣmaṁka tahiṁki karanti gabana
nikaṇṭaka rājya kara ẏebe tohora sukha | 10 |
kimpā ho dharmarāja ailu mora pāśa
badaẏanti pāṇḍaba śuṇa kurukuḷa mukhya ye puruṣa | 11 |
sammukhe yujhele tote kehu jiṇima raṇa | 12 |
boila ye śatr̥ māri pañchu kaṭake hua naranātha
ẏe bacana śuṇi āgyāṁ dile gaṅgāsuta
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bacane tote kicchi bhaẏe nāhiṁ
prajāṁka rakṣaṇe sinā rājā hoẏe sukhī | 18 |
nyāẏe prajānta pāḷile indra kare br̥ṣṭi
parajā atuṭa hoile rājāku hoai sakaḷa siddhi | 20 |
rājya daṇḍa baragibu dhārmika loka dekhi
tebe se jana parajā hoibe baḍa sukhī | 21 |
chāra baragi dekhibu bidhi ye abidhi
daṇḍa abidhi kale tu pakāibuṭi chedi | 22 |
anīti byāpāre daṇḍile ye nāhiṁ doṣa
doṣa jāṇiṇa śāsti debu tu paṇḍu śiṣa | 23 |
koḍiẏe hātha tuhi karibu naḷa kāṭhi
ṭhābe ṭhābe rājā ye karibu jaḷakīrtti
indra br̥ṣṭi na kale kṣeta yehne bratī | 26 |
aḷapa doṣaku bābu na karibu roṣa
brāhmaṇe dāna debu na kari kapaṭa
anaḷa dāna tahiṁ deba ṭhābe ṭhābe
patha śrānta jane yehne kḷeśa na pāibe | 30 |
chatā pāṇo(?)i śīḍhaḷa sañchā nānā basramāna | 31 |
yama tāhāku daṇḍi nuārai kāḷapāśa gheni | 34 |
maḍhaphuli niyoga biśvāsa loka hāthe debu
se lokaku adhikāra na debu na daṇḍibu | 36 |
aprādhi jane kṣamā karibu bolanti śaẏantanī | 37 |
pāñcha baraṣa ghoḍa pañchāśa baraṣara rāuta
paciśa baraṣara pādānti satara barasa gajamatta | 38 |
paṇḍitara mukhuṁ śuṇuthibu purāṇa ye pothā
asura bhoga tīrthe na buḍāiba kaẏe
andhārī bijekāḷe kahākaiṁ biśvāsa na yibu | 44 |
bideśī lokanta kaṭake na debuṭi paśi | 46 |
ye yāhā anarūpe bratibe sakaḷa barga
yāga yagyaṁ prasaṅge ye deuthibu āhiti
daṇḍ abihibu ye upagata śatr̥ prati | 48 |
kr̥kṣikārī lokanta ye na daṇḍibu dhana
ẏe bidhire aneka kahile bhīṣma rājabidhimāna
bhīṣme boile bho kr̥ṣṇa muṁ tohore śaraṇa
ẏete kahi gaṅgabe chaḍile nija prāṇa | 58 |
puṣyeka bibāne basāi nele baṣṇa gaṇe
jagata bandhu nātha prasāda pāibi baikuṇṭhe | 61 |
namāmi śrī nārāẏaṇa śaṅkha catra dhāraṇa
bhagata jana uddhāraṇa nāṭha, nāma narahari | 63 |

div.note: –baibuṇṭha bhmabane tāṁku dileka dibyasthāne |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: śatr̥paṇe ye cintilā se hoilāka mokṣa | 64 |
śatr̥ mitra hou bā samaste svargagāmī | 65 |
āhe caitana rodhira māẏeṁsa kardama dvādaśa yojana bhūmi
brāhmaṇa hou ki chāṇḍāḷa heu mr̥tupiṇḍe na basile kr̥mi | 66 |
mama hr̥de māḷā gaṇḍasthaḷe heu kaṇṭhi | 67 |
kamaḷa māḷeka hoi bighaṁsu mor ahiẏā | 68 |
prāṇa apāna byāna udāna samāna pañchu ātmā
kr̥ṣṇahuṁ ānajana na bhābuṁ mama ātmā | 69 |
bhagati manāi biṣṇu loke basile pratakṣa | 70 |
rakṣa bhakṣa heti praheti māḷi ye sumāḷi
badaẏanti sāraḷā dāsa tuḷasāmāḷā mama bakṣasthaḷe lmaḷe | 75 |

div.head: {@duryyodhanādi o bhīṣmaṅkara piṇḍadāha@}

lg.l: yāiṇa prabeśa hoile gāndhārī dhr̥tirāṣṭa kati | 2 |
gāndhārī bacana śuṇi se pañchai pāṇḍabe
yujheṣṭhi boile driyodhanakaiṁ āṇa yāi byāsa sarobara tīruṁ
bhīmasena bahiāṇilā yāiṁ ki jāṇi diśai giriteru | 5 |
śate bhrātha mūḷe yete bandhu sodara hoi | 6 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boiel ẏekā beḷake dahana hontu ẏehi
dakṣiṇa mr̥tti hoi sadhīre bahai pabana
tahiṁki paśu mr̥tuśaba hoilā māna ye gobinda | 9 |

lg.note:
–samasta mr̥tupiṇḍamāna hoile samidha
tahiṁki mūḷa mr̥tuśaba hoilā māna gobinda |(jha, ṭha, na, kha)

lg.l: bābu rājyabhāra siṁghāsana paḷuthibu yujheṣṭhi tu jyeṣṭha | 11 |
ẏe putraṁka abhābe āmbhe bratibu kisa kari
yujheṣṭhi boile śuṇīmā bho tāta māta
muhiṁ tumbhara ki yugate nohai tanaẏe | 14 |
bābu parama kalyāṇa tu huasi nr̥pati
māgha saṁtrāntiki ye pandara dina bhoga | 20 |
hastā nakṣatra hoicchi bhoga se dinara | 22 |
se dina gadā samara hoilāka śeṣa
ẏete dibasa hoilā bhīṣme adahana achanti | 26 |
jība thāuṁ thāuṁ se melanti sāhera | 33 |
baḍabā anaḷa teje haai se dahi
kuśa dvīpare ye nāhiṁ jāṇa kicchi | 35 |
padmadvīpa madhye ye caubiṁśa thāna acchi

lg.note: jība thāuṁ thāuṁ se mela śveta gaṅgāra |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: bho jagannātha svāmī ẏebe karibāka kisa | 37 |
hari, kaurobaṅka mukha na chāhiṁbi boli
cauda baraṣa muṁ ye banabāsa kali | 39 |
arjuna pratagyāṁkalā māilā bhīṣma droṇa karṇṇakaiṁ | 41 |
āmbhe pratagyāṁ kari śalyaṁku kalu nāśa
dhaumya prehite ye madhyapātra paṇe gale
dhaumya prohite boile pratagyāṁ kale yete
triẏā karibāku puṇa abasara nāhiṁ mote | 45 |

lg.note: śuṇiṇa yujheṣṭhi deba bismaẏa haraṣa |(ka, ṭa, jha)
kriẏā karibāku puṇa asara nāhiṁ mote |(jha, ṭa, ka)

dharmaṁkara pratagyāṁ samaste hoibe bidhi
tumbhara pratagyāṁ sāchā hoilā sarba siddhi |(jha, ṭa)

lg.l: nāma ye dhare tumbhara se bhabajaḷuṁ uddhare
badaẏanti sāroḷā dāsa mo mana rahu śrīkr̥ṣṇa paẏare | 49 | 124 |
lg.head: {@yudhiṣṭhiraṁkara rājyābhiṣeka@}

lg.l: nabalakṣa bāḷakhiḷā gheni aile agasti mahāruṣi | 6 |
lakṣeba śiṣya gheni aile pāreśvara puruṣā | 7 |
ahi brateka śiṣya gheniṇa aile uddāḷaka
naba sahasra śiṣya gheni biśvāmitra aile
ahibrateka śiṣya gheni bije mārakaṇḍa ruṣi
ruṣyaśr̥ṅga tule bije naba sahasra bāḷaśiṣi | 10 |

lg.note: baśiṣṭhaṁku sumaraṇā kaleka yujheṣṭhi |(kha, na, jha, ṭa)

uddāḷaka bibhāṇaka gheni lomaśaṁka tule
sahisre śiṣa gheni sumantaka bijekale |(jha, gha, da, ṛha, cha)
lg.l: naba sahasra śiṣya gheni bijaẏe lomaśa
garga pāñcha ahibrata śiṣya tule gheni | 14 |
āho caitana yete ruṣi thile āraṇaṁka kāḷe
samata aile ye yujheṣṭhi pāṭa abhiṣeka kāḷe | 17 |
kaṣā kaupunī hāthe daṇḍa kamaṇḍaḷa japāmāḷī
bhmasma lepana ke gopī br̥ndābna cita ye śāmaḷi | 18 |
trikaccha basana śohe kākhe beda ye karāṇḍi
pothi chatā pabitra uttarī hātheṇa kuśabiḍi | 19 |
śaṅkhaśabade ye kale nānā maṅgaḷa dhuni
śrīkr̥sṇa caraṇe śaraṇa paśai sāroḷā dāsa muni | 21 |
śuṇa baibasuta manu badaẏanti agasti mahāmuni
yujheṣṭhi abhiṣeka pāpa nāśana ye dhuni | 22 |
kare kuśabatu tambāpātrī śohe gopyāna dohorā | 24 |
kara prasari beda ādhyāna rusi kaẏe | 25 |
ruka yaju sāma atharba beda chāri
bho daiba puruṣa ẏehā tu mote kalu
sāgara saṅgame paśi jhāsa debā nija prāṇa
abhiṣeka sarile āmbhe yāi sina puṇa | 31 |
śveta barṇṇa basra śvetabarṇṇa ye kaḷasa
śveta śrīphaḷa śvetaguā akṣata ye prakāśra | 34 |
śveta pāruā śvetaguñja śveta bāẏasā śveta śaṅkhacila
śvetabarṇṇa saurabha pātrare lakṣeka prokṣaṇī surā
prāṇatyāka baśyānara kāḷānaḷa bahani piṅgaḷa jvāḷa
jāta anaḷa baḍabānaḷa troṭa anala bana anaḷa | 42 |
bhoga anaḷ ayoga anaḷa trodha anaḷa bahati
āchāryya baraṇa mākeṇḍe brahmā baraṇa śuke
ajapā mantreṇa japanti pāñchalākṣa śiṣi basi | 46 |
lakṣmī nārāẏaṇa rudra kr̥sṇa ye piṅgaḷā | 48 |
bidāraṇa narasiṁgha jaṭa narasiṁgha yoga narasiṁgha | 50 |

div.note: śveta pābaccha śveta prāṅgaṇa śveta śūkasārī |(jha, ṇa, ṭa)

lg.l: abiṣeka narasiṁgha japa narasiṁgha pratimā lakṣe narasiṁgha | 52 |
bāmana pratimā lakṣeka praśurāma prtimā lakṣe
śrīrāma pratimā haḷadhara kalkī pratimā asaṁkhyo | 53 |
sadāśiba bāmadeba pratimā lakṣeka bāṇa liṅga
triśākhā belapatrī liṅga goṭike lakṣeka saṁyoga | 54 |
ẏekā liṅgake lakṣe lakṣe duhāṁḷa ye gāī
daśa abatāṛe tuḷasīmāḷa lakṣeka ābharaṇa karāi | 55 |
sahasreka bhmaja hoẏe lakṣeka durgā ye pratimā
caturmukha hoi lakṣeka brahmā ye uttamā | 56 |
lakṣeka pratimā sarba maṅgaḷā ye pituḷi
bāra āditya ṣoḷa candramā pabana aṇachāṣa
naba grahaṁka mūḷe ye digapāḷ adaśa | 58 |
śaṁkha śveta padma mahāpadma karkoṭaka takṣaka kuḷika mūḷe ananta
aṣṭa ratnare nirbāṇa ye aṣṭakuḷā nāgānta | 59 |
lakṣeka pratimā kale grāma ye debatī
yama kāḷa bikāḷa citra ye gupati | 60 |
subarṇṇara śira nakha mukha chāri caraṇa kari
lakṣeka āsana kr̥ṣṇājina ye chauṁrī pāḍi | 61 |
ḍāhāṇabra teka śaṁkha lakṣeka subarṇṇa bandha phuri
saraguṇā adhāṭi marddaḷa gaṇapati bīṇāyantra saṅgīta gāẏeṇī | 65 |
śubha anakaḷa dhaile māhīndra yoga yete | 66 |
tahiṁra upare netara basna aye māna | 68 |
śāḷagrāma śiḷā lakṣe aṣṭaratna tahiṁ toḷi | 69 |
koṭiẏe māṇikya mukuṭa śire dharmarāẏe bhari | 72 |
subarṇṇara utturī pabitrā gheniṇa parama yogī
yujheṣṭhi debaṁku nei byāse karāi lāgi | 73 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇe ābharaṇe kale nei yujheṣṭhiṁka gaḷā | 74 |
bijaẏe pāñchāḷī yāiṁ yujheṣṭhi debaṁka koḍara | 76 |
pacheṇa nakuḷa ye kaṇaẏa daṇḍa gheni | 77 |
āgeṇa ubhā sahadeba kākhe mahāmantra pothi
ratna ābharaṇa kale āṇi śrīkr̥ṣṇa pañchamr̥tti | 78 |
ẏemāna lakṣe lakṣe maẏūra jhāli pakṣī | 80 |
airābrata ārohi kaṇaẏa br̥ṣṭi tahim karai debaindra | 83 |
yujheṣṭhiṁka śire puṣkara abhiṣeka kalā āṇi | 84 |
amr̥ta br̥sṭi karanti tahiṁ ye meghamāḷā
śuṇa ho rājana koṭiẏe tīrthe jaḷa gheni samasta maharuṣi
pādāarghya dei pūjā karanti sarbe āsi | 86 |

div.note:
mukutā chatra pañcha gaṇikā ābharaṇikā
kaṇaẏa samudra jāṇi rāhurekhā tejarekhā |(jha, ṭa)

śire arghya deiṇa ye karanti āśiṣi
bidhimate abhiṣeka hoile dharmaśiṣi |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: bīra marddaḷa bijighoṣa ghaṇṭānāde kampai mahīkhaṇḍi | 88 |
khaṇḍaṇa maṇḍaṇa nātha karantā deba sarba | 91 |
jagata jana bāndhaba nātha aṭu biśvarūpī | 92 |
nuhai paṇḍita muṁ na jāṇai śāsrabidhi
tāhā muṁ bakhāṇili hr̥deṇa satva gheni | 95 |
janem janme bhagati muṁ jhaṁkhera pura bāsī
śrīkr̥ṣṇa bacane sāroḷā dāsa śaẏaḷa jana toṣi | 96 |
ẏethu anantare baibasuta manu ye prakāśi
koṭiẏe baṁśa gheni tarili ho agasti maharuṣi
ẏekalaẏe kari śrabaṇe śuṇanti gābanti yete loka
jarābyādhi nāhiṁ aṅge na basibāka śoka | 100 |
āṣya dhanadhānya putra ye yāhā mane icchi
abaśya prāpata huẏe mane yāhā bāñchi | 101 |
go koṭi dāna dile koṭiẏe tīrtha kale
anna basra jaḷabhūmi dāna kariba bipuḷa
kehi tulya nuhanti bhāratha śrabaṇa puṇyaphaḷa | 103 |
he budhajane śrīkr̥ṣṇe bhagati baikuṇṭhe yāhara icchā
dharmarājā abiṣeka śuṇi karanti ye yāhā manebāñchā | 104 |
dharma artha kāmamokṣa prāpata hoiba catubarga
śarīre na pīḍai kāḷa kāma nidrā
basiba biṣṇu bhagataṁka saha indrara saṁgate | 107 |
ẏeḍe abiṣeka kāḷe nāhiṁ hāthī ye pādānti | 109 |
agasti boile śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁkara lakṣe ṣāṭhiẏe sahasra aśiẏe nandana
ẏemāne ārohichanti ye yāhāra yāna ye bāhāna | 110 |
lg.note: baḷa buddhi prāpata ye hoai sarbadā |(kha, na)

lg.l: bihaḍanti bīre mānāraṅge āgapache sātabaṁśa saini | 111 |
yadu baṁśa bīramāne diśanti kamadeba prāẏe
āu samaste diśuchanti ye br̥ndāraka prāẏe | 112 |
bhramanti līḷāẏe se pañcha ye praśaste | 114 |
mahā sambharbeṇa ye pañchu rājye pheri
ẏehi rūpe svarga prāpata tote hoẏe | 117 |
ye yāhāra āśrame prabeśa hele āsi | 119 |

lg.note:
saṁgatare chanti pahiṁ deba cakradhārī
aneka sambharba se kahita ki pāri |(jha, gha)

rājye ẏekachatra hoile yujheṣṭhi deba
nija bhmabanaku galeka bāsaba |(ṭa)

lg.l: ẏesaneka br̥ttānta yahuṁ sañchapi sakaḷa kahile

lg.head:
{@dūboṅgāsā ruṣi kr̥ṣṇaṅka māẏā darśana kari brahmāṅku
jaṇāibā o koṇārka tīrtha mahatmya barṇṇana@}

lg.l: bho ruṣi paḍilāki śrīkr̥ṣṇaṁku gāndhārī śāpa bāki | 1 |
badaẏanti agasti śuṇa baibasuta manu rāẏe
cauda lakṣa baḷa gheniṇa hari āẏe | 3 |
śrīhari rahile ye dvārika pura svarga
ṣoḷa sahasra naẏikā gheni karanti baibhoga | 5 |
aile durbhāsā yahiṁ achanti daibakīra suta | 7 |
śrikr̥ṣṇa sahite tāṁku arghye pūjileka āṇi | 11 |
kr̥ṣṇaṁku dekhiṇa muni santoṣa ye mana

lg.note: dharmādharma bichāriṇa rājyakāryya kale |(kha, na, ṭha)

lg.l: tahiṁ bije karichanti dekhile deba catradhara | 15 |
batiśa sahasra kanyāṁka ẏe kemante harai citta | 16 |
ẏete bichāri muni gabana kari āsi
tahiṁ dekhile kr̥ṣṇa chanti tāṁka tule
chaṣiṁki dekhi banamāḷī praṇapatya kaleka turite | 18 |
putra pautra gheni namaskāra kaleka śrīhari | 20 |
ẏesaneka batiśa sahasra kanyāpure paśile mahamuni | 21 |
putra pautra samete praḷamba karanti catrapāṇi | 22 |
ṣoḷa sahasra apakṣarī āṇile māriṇa nārakā | 23 |
saburi mandire dekhile śrīkr̥ṣṇa chanti basi | 24 |
pr̥thīra bhārābhara uśvāsa kari kiṁke nuāsanti ruṣīkeśe | 30 |
se kr̥ṣṇa ābaraṭi ho nuāsanti svarge | 31 |
bho parameṣṭhi se āsibe āu kāhiṁ
yebaṇa carita muṁ dekhili tahā tahiṁ | 32 |
batiśa sahasra kanyāpure mote kale hāde pūjā
āpaṇe āpaṇe muṁ ye pailaiṁ lajjā | 33 |
kanhā abatare ẏebe pāibe nāhiṁki sukha | 35 |
āho pr̥thī dukha dekhi āmbhe galāiṁ kr̥ṣṇara pāśe
kṣīra samodra madhye nirmāṇa ẏeka pura
tusti kari āmbhe boilu rakha ho banamāḷi | 38 |
kimpe debagaṇa tumbhe kala ho āgamana | 39 |
boiluṁ sakaḷa debe kr̥ta āñjoḷi kari | 40 |
bho deba biṣṇu nātha tote ailāiṁ kahi | 41 |
hasi parama biṣṇa kahile parameṣṭhira āge
daśaratha ghare āmbhe janmilu tretaẏ ye yuge | 42 |
rāma rūpe upujiluṁ sītyā harāiṇa pāiluṁ bahuta dukha
tetriśa koṭi debe tāhā dekhichata pratakṣa | 43 |
para biṇṣura bacane debe kale śaṁkā
tu yebe pr̥thīki ho nakaribu kāraṇa
biṣṇara nirāśa bacane pr̥thī rodana ye kalā
tāhāra rodante harihara daẏā ye basilā | 48 |
kimpāiṁ rodana go debī karuacha tumbhe
māilaiṁ bāre bāre ye dānaba samasta
bāre bāre paḍai mote dukha ye bahuta | 51 |
ẏebe debī tumbhe nakara mane cintā
muhiṁ janami sukha bhmañji karibaiṁ ḷālī | 53 |
rāma rūpare muṁ pāilaiṁ bahuta dukha
basudeba ghare se janama yāiṁ hoẏe | 55 |
samudrakaiṁ bhūmi māgi dvārikā pura kari | 57 |
kṣaḷa sahasra nāẏikā amaru dilu bācchi
paradārā ramaṇa tu kara ho śirībatsi | 58 |
ẏethu anantare śuṇa tu ho yati
se bhoga bhmañjai ẏebe deba bāsudeba | 60 |
tāhāṁka tr̥pti pāiṁ deba dharichanti aneka mūrati | 61 |
pitāmaha boile bho durbhāsā tu bahana hoi yibu
tu bābu dvārikāẏe thibu satyabhāmāra dvāre
āgyāṁ meṇṭile śāmba tu niśce śāpa ye pāibu | 66 |
yepari kehi na paśi pāribeṭi bhitara bhmabane | 67 |
śāmba kumaraku dvāre thoi rahile niścinte | 68 |
puṇa pitamaha bacane durbhāsyāẏe ẏekadine āsi
śāmba kumara tāhāṁku bhitare na dilāka paśi | 69 |
sāmanya kāryya hoile bāhuḍi tumbhe yāa
durbhāsyāẏe boile baḍāi ākaṭa re bābu
muhiṁ putra hoi kesaneke paśibi sadane | 73 |
durbhāsyāẏe boile tumbhe bega hoi yāasi
bolai śāmba kumar akr̥ta āñjoḷi ye hoi
keuṁṇa mate bhitare muṁ paśibaiṁ yāiṁ | 75 |
ẏeteka bacana śuṇi muni ye kopile
śāmbakaiṁ kaṭāḷa kariṇa bahuta bācana boile | 76 |
athabā tu yebe na yibu bhitare
ẏehikṣaṇi dvārikā sahite bhasma karibi tohore | 77 |
kr̥ṣṇakaiṁ tu yāi na āṇile śāma
bhāḷai śāmba kumara muṁ karibaiṁ kemanta
na galeṇa bhasma ẏe kariba mohore sātabaṁśa | 80 |
pitāra kope muṁ ye jaṇe nāśayibi
muhiṁ ẏekā male sina sātabaṁśa uddhari dharibi | 81 |
rasabhaṅga hoiṇa kr̥ṣṇara teje uṭhilā bahani | 84 |
kopeṇa prajjvaḷita deba śrī puruṣa uttama
mama bacana bhagna kari kimpe ailure śāma | 85 |
mohora āgyāṁ putrare kalu yebe bhraṣṭa
tohroa śajhare śāmba houre gaḷuta kuṣṭha | 86 |
śāmba boilā deba kimpe dilu śāpa
sarbagyaṁ puruṣa hoi na bichari kalu kopa | 88 |
boile ẏehikṣaṇi kr̥ṣṇaṁku na dekhile naẏane
pura dahana karibiṭi ẏebe yāa tu bahane | 91 |
yebe kopa mote anamite kalu svāmī
śāmba kathā śuṇi kr̥ṣṇa caḷile bahana
kr̥sṇa boile muni he kaha kimpā āgamana
durbhāsā boile tote dhātāṁkara āgyāṁ acchi
marttyapura teji ākāśaku āsa he śrībatsi | 95 |
śrīkr̥ṣṇa boile yebe āgyāṁ dile deba dhātā
durbhāsyā boile are śuṇa bābu śāma
tapa kara yāiṁ tuhi bhaskara tīrtha yā nāma | 98 |
durbhāsyāṁka bāṇī śuṇi śāma tahum caḷigalā
baṭa pratikṣaṇa kari kalā koṇārka draśana | 100 |
nirāśi upabāse baṭa komaḷa patra bhakṣi
puṇi brahmāra āgare samasta kahile bujhāi
puṇi agastiṁku pucchile ye manu narapati | 104 |
boile ho muni śāmba kumara tapakaiṁ galā
koṭiẏe tīrtha gheni tahiṁ bijaẏe debī gaṅga | 107 |
tahiṁ srāhāna kari ye dekhai birañchi
śarīra nikaḷaṁka tāhāra bhala hoilāka byādhi | 110 |
bāhuḍi diśai makara ketana jāṇi tāra kāẏe
dekhiṇa śāmba kumara durbhāsā caraṇe pariṇāmi
sādhu ẏe tīrthara mahimāṁa kahibā bote svāmī | 113 |
yahuṁ ādi srijana hoilā ẏehu tīrtha | 114 |
ẏethi se tapa hāde karuthilā satyapā | 115 |
se pada ghenima boli baḷāilā bāḷamati | 116 |
ẏehi candrabhāgā kūḷe kalā basi tapa
nabaśata baraṣe se na dekhilā birañchi sarūpa | 117 |
bāṇikya nāme karaṇa brahma nāme yoga
biśrāma kala āsi se arkabaṭara taḷe | 120 |
maudadhi candra bhāgāra madhye karai se tapa | 121 |
bhāḷai arkadatya ẏe aṭai mahu māṁsa
ẏehā bhojana karibi muṁ achai pañcha dibasa upabāsā | 122 |
lg.note: ẏehā bhojana karibi mora bahu dina upabāsa |(kha, na, ṭha)
lg.l: ẏeteka bichari se bāhāra baṭa taḷu
dhīre caraṇa tāra chāḷai heḷuṁ heḷuṁ | 123 |
pacha katire āsi miḷilā hoiṇa ye tuni
luhāra yaṣṭi ẏeka hātare acchi gheni | 124 |
se yaṣṭi uñchāiacchi piṭiba nei śire
svāmī tapadhanī goṭiki ẏe māriba bẏehikṣaṇa | 126 |
jāṇile āmbhaṁku dhyāna basi ẏe karai | 127 |
lakṣeka yojanakaiṁ se bhmaja baḍhāi nele
arka daitara kara birañchinārāẏaṇa ye dhaile | 129 |
āre raha raha ḍākanti birañchi nārāẏaṇa uccasvare boli
mohore bibādī heu tohore kida yaśa | 132 |
muhiṁ sehi karatāra re ẏe tīrtha mora jāṇa | 133 |
arkadatya boilā muṁ ẏe tīrthara nr̥pati
yadyapi kalu ture ẏe mahātīrtha ṭhāba
kimpāi anīti re kalu datya ẏeba | 135 |
tote na māile ẏethi ke tīrtha karai
paḍi kāḷacatra tahiṁ hoilā śate cūnā | 137 |
bakṣasthaḷe māḍi basile bhāskara ye tīrtha | 139 |
kaḷapa baṭa taḷe candrabhāgā maudadhira tīre
pr̥thīra agni koṇe yehu arka daitaku dhvaṁsi
teṇukari koṇārka nāma dile amara svargabāsī | 141 |
jāgara jāḷi ujāgare jāgai ye rāti | 143 |
candra bhāgāẏe sthāne arkabaṭa ye draśana
śrī koṇārka tīrtha nāma yeuṁṇa tīrthagoti
arka bidāraṇa jyoti ananta koṭi brahmāṇḍa | 148 |
samaste andha deba tuhi se sarba ẏekā dekhu | 150 |
draśane pāpa dhvaṁsana prasanne hoi rājā | 152 |
muhiṁ tāhā bhābili bhāskara kalyāṇa kalpabaṭe | 154 |
badaẏanti sāroḷa dāsa mote karasi uddhāraṇa | 155 | 407 |

div.note: aruṇa prakāśe yāhāra bidāraṇa rātra |(jha, ṭa)
